name: AVI (Audio Video Interleaved) with DivX Video Codec
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">avi, gvi</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
